channel.title: Impact 3.0 - The Return of a Masterpiece
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/23r8ldx.png[/img][/CENTER]
[b]Follow & Subscribe for the most recent updates![/b] [URL=http://www.youtube.com/impact3rsps]YouTube[/URL] [URL=https://twitter.com/Impact_3]Twitter[/URL]
[LEFT][B][U][size=4]Information:[/SIZE][/U][/B] If you don't remember me I am Core, the original creator and programmer of ImpactPK, Impact Reborn, and Impact 2.0. I am here to present you with the progress of my latest work, Impact 3.0. This time around I am focusing on a perfect server that mixes between higher revision content and lower revision content. But what's going to be different about mine? It will be a multiworld server for different content revisions letting the player completely decide which era of RuneScape they wish too play.
[B][U][size=4]The Client:[/SIZE][/U][/B] Since I do believe a clean operating client is an, if not the most, important part that a server requires, so I will only be dealing with the best. [user]Galkon[/user] and I have agreed upon a deal for the Impact 3.0 508+ Client. Some miniscule features for the client so far are:
New Items/Objects/Npcs/Maps/Interfaces/Etc. Fullscreen/Resizable Runs cleanly
For the 459- client I will be using a very clean running client with all 459 data.
[B][U][size=4]The Server:[/SIZE][/U][/B] Like I said in the information this game has multiworld support with communication through a Login server. The character files save for different worlds so you can switch between them. The first world will be for lower revision content(459-) and the second world for high revision content(508+). If you are wondering what the speed of experience will be and how the economy will be set up, the experience will be set to RuneScape experience x 75 and you will receive all your items through minigames, drops, quests, and more.[/LEFT]
[size=3] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2qdc100.png[/img][size=5][color=orange]Music[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Client StartUp Music Sound Effects Music Loading Per Area
[IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh556/Core006/World_map_icon.png[/img][size=5][color=orange]Traveling[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Custom Wizard Teleport Other Locations: Al-Kharid, Canifis, Taverley, TzHaar, Barrows, Pest Control, Duel Arena, and Warrior's Guild
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/15frale.png[/img][size=5][color=orange]Combat[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Multicombat and Singlecombat zones Entity based combat Combat following Second Hit Update Poisoning
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/28bv8dl.png[/img][size=3][color=orange]Melee[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Correct Animations, Speeds, and Special Attacks Accurate Max Hit formula with all correct data Accurate Accuracy and Defence formulas Correct Weapon Requirements Weapons degrade
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2roncyp.png[/img][size=3][color=limegreen]Ranged[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Correct Bow and Arrows requirements Correct Speeds, Animations, and Graphics Accurate Max Hit, Accuracy, and Defence formulas All Special Attacks Dark Bow Crossbows Darts Knives
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/ogzxx5.png[/img][size=3][color=limegreen]Magic[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Correct Animations, Graphics, and speeds. Accurate Max Hit, Accuracy, and Defence formulas Home Teleport Normal Magic Book Ancients Magic Book Staffs Autocast Vengeance
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2qce1qx.png[/img][size=3][color=limegreen]Prayer[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Bone Burying All Possible Bones with Correct Exp All Prayers Working Correct Requirements Correct Head Icons
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/34nsizc.png[/img][size=3][color=limegreen]Thieving[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Pickpocketable NPCs Correct Loots Correct Exp Stunning Correct Requirements Stall Thieving Stall Respawning Guards Attacking Thieves
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/9ib4o5.png[/img][size=3][color=orange]Slayer[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Vannaka, Turael Slayer Task Giving Kill your Task for Exp and to Decrease your Task Correct Slayer Level Requirements for all Monsters
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2e2nhvc.png[/img][size=3][color=limegreen]Fishing[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Correct Animations Correct Fishing Spots Correct Requirements(Levels, Nets, Rods, Bait, Feathers, Etc.) Shrimp, Anchovies, Sardines, Herring, Trout, Salmon, Pike, Lobster, Tuna, Swordfish, Mackerel, Cod, Bass, Shark, and Monkfish
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/sku6ue.png[/img][size=3][color=limegreen]Cooking[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Correct Requirements, Animations, and Exp Accurate Burn Formula All Fish Cookable
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/309im4n.png[/img][size=3][color=limegreen]Woodcutting[/COLOR][/SIZE]
All Axes and Trees Correct Requirements, Animations, and Exp Tree Respawning
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/m67nn.png[/img][size=3][color=limegreen]Fletching[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Correct Animations, Requirements, and Exp Shafts Shortbows Longbows Bow Stringing Arrow Making
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/54jmx.png[/img][size=3][color=limegreen]Firemaking[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Correct Animations, Requirements, and Exp Fire Burns to Ashes Global Fire Clipping
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2qki22w.png[/img][size=3][color=orange]Crafting[/COLOR][/SIZE]

item.title: Impact 3.0 - The Return of a Masterpiece
item.dc:creator: @Cored Cored
item.description:
@Cored wrote:

The Wanderer:

There is no poison hit masks. Theres two hit masks and they have different hit types. And mask is a bad name for them as it is just saying that is the operation (OR). Update block is much better as it is a block or part of the updating process.

You are very right my good sir, was a force of habit of terminology I actually already knew this it has just been awhile since I have programmed so some areas are a bit more cloudy then others XD

Read full topic

item.title: Impact 3.0 - The Return of a Masterpiece
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

There is no poison hit masks. Theres two hit masks and they have different hit types. And mask is a bad name for them as it is just saying that is the operation (OR). Update block is much better as it is a block or part of the updating process.

item.title: Impact 3.0 - The Return of a Masterpiece
item.dc:creator: @Cored Cored
item.description:
@Cored wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]

Follow & Subscribe for the most recent updates!
YouTube
Twitter

[LEFT][size=4]Information:[/SIZE]
If you don’t remember me I am Core, the original creator and programmer of ImpactPK, Impact Reborn, and Impact 2.0. I am here to present you with the progress of my latest work, Impact 3.0. This time around I am focusing on a perfect server that mixes between higher revision content and lower revision content. But what’s going to be different about mine? It will be a multiworld server for different content revisions letting the player completely decide which era of RuneScape they wish too play.

[size=4]The Client:[/SIZE]
Since I do believe a clean operating client is an, if not the most, important part that a server requires, so I will only be dealing with the best. [user]Galkon[/user] and I have agreed upon a deal for the Impact 3.0 508+ Client. Some miniscule features for the client so far are:

New Items/Objects/Npcs/Maps/Interfaces/Etc.
Fullscreen/Resizable
Runs cleanly

For the 459- client I will be using a very clean running client with all 459 data.

[size=4]The Server:[/SIZE]
Like I said in the information this game has multiworld support with communication through a Login server. The character files save for different worlds so you can switch between them. The first world will be for lower revision content(459-) and the second world for high revision content(508+). If you are wondering what the speed of experience will be and how the economy will be set up, the experience will be set to RuneScape experience x 75 and you will receive all your items through minigames, drops, quests, and more.[/LEFT]

[size=3]
[size=5][color=orange]Music[/COLOR][/SIZE]

Client StartUp Music
Sound Effects
Music Loading Per Area

[size=5][color=orange]Traveling[/COLOR][/SIZE]

Custom Wizard Teleport Other
Locations: Al-Kharid, Canifis, Taverley, TzHaar, Barrows, Pest Control, Duel Arena, and Warrior’s Guild

[size=5][color=orange]Combat[/COLOR][/SIZE]

Multicombat and Singlecombat zones
Entity based combat
Combat following
Second Hit Update
Poisoning

[size=3][color=orange]Melee[/COLOR][/SIZE]

Correct Animations, Speeds, and Special Attacks

Accurate Accuracy and Defence formulas
Correct Weapon Requirements
Weapons degrade

Correct Interfaces
Dagger, Sword, Scimitar, Longsword, 2Hand sword, Axe, Mace, Warhammer, Battleaxe, Claws, Chainbody, Platelegs, Plateskirt, Platebody, Med Helm, Full Helm, Square Shield, Kite Shield, Nails, Dart Tips, Arrow Tips, Throwing Knives, Bolts and Limbs
